definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: smooth part, smoothness, flattery;—cstr. [[חֶלְקַת]] Ge 27:16, Pr 6:24; pl. [[חֲלָקוֹת]] Ps 12:3 + 3 t.;—
pl. slippery places Ps 73:18 fig. of situation of wicked.
smoothness = flattery ´[[שְׂפַת חִ]] Ps 12:3, cf. v:Ps 12:4; [[חֶלְקַת לָשׁוֹן]] Pr 6:24; = subst. pl. smooth things, i.e. agreeable, flattering things Is 30:10.—1. [[חֶלְקָה]] v. sub I. [[חלק]].
